001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.tools.cli.core.commands;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.commands.MetaschemaCommands;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor.CallingContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitCode;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.InvalidArgumentException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.AbstractTerminalCommand;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.CommandExecutionException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.DefaultExtraArgument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ExtraArgument;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ICommandExecutor;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
020import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
021import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
022import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
023
024import java.io.File;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.net.URI;
027import java.nio.file.Path;
028import java.util.Collection;
029import java.util.List;
030
031import javax.xml.transform.TransformerException;
032
033import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
034import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
035
036public abstract class AbstractRenderCommand
037    extends AbstractTerminalCommand {
038  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(AbstractRenderCommand.class);
039
040  @NonNull
041  private static final String COMMAND = "render";
042  @NonNull
043  private static final List<ExtraArgument> EXTRA_ARGUMENTS = ObjectUtils.notNull(List.of(
044      new DefaultExtraArgument("source file", true),
045      new DefaultExtraArgument("destination file", false)));
046
047  @NonNull
048  private static final Option OVERWRITE_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
049      Option.builder()
050          .longOpt("overwrite")
051          .desc("overwrite the destination if it exists")
052          .build());
053
054  @Override
055  public String getName() {
056    return COMMAND;
057  }
058
059  @SuppressWarnings("null")
060  @Override
061  public Collection<? extends Option> gatherOptions() {
062    return List.of(OVERWRITE_OPTION);
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "EI_EXPOSE_REP", justification = "unmodifiable collection and immutable item")
067  public List<ExtraArgument> getExtraArguments() {
068    return EXTRA_ARGUMENTS;
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public void validateOptions(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine cmdLine) throws InvalidArgumentException {
073    List<String> extraArgs = cmdLine.getArgList();
074    if (extraArgs.size() != 2) {
075      throw new InvalidArgumentException("Both a source and destination argument must be provided.");
076    }
077
078    File source = new File(extraArgs.get(0));
079    if (!source.exists()) {
080      throw new InvalidArgumentException("The provided source '" + source.getPath() + "' does not exist.");
081    }
082    if (!source.canRead()) {
083      throw new InvalidArgumentException("The provided source '" + source.getPath() + "' is not readable.");
084    }
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public ICommandExecutor newExecutor(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine cmdLine) {
089    return ICommandExecutor.using(callingContext, cmdLine, this::executeCommand);
090  }
091
092  @SuppressWarnings({
093      "PMD.OnlyOneReturn", // readability
094      "unused"
095  })
096  protected void executeCommand(
097      @NonNull CallingContext callingContext,
098      @NonNull CommandLine cmdLine) throws CommandExecutionException {
099    List<String> extraArgs = cmdLine.getArgList();
100    Path destination = null;
101    if (extraArgs.size() > 1) {
102      destination = MetaschemaCommands.handleDestination(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(extraArgs.get(1)), cmdLine);
103    }
104
105    URI source = MetaschemaCommands.handleSource(
106        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(extraArgs.get(0)),
107        ObjectUtils.notNull(getCurrentWorkingDirectory().toUri()));
108
109    try {
110      performRender(source, destination);
111    } catch (IOException ex) {
112      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.IO_ERROR, ex);
113    } catch (TransformerException ex) {
114      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.PROCESSING_ERROR, ex);
115    }
116
117    if (destination != null && LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
118      LOGGER.info("Generated HTML file: " + destination.toString());
119    }
120  }
121
122  protected abstract void performRender(@NonNull URI input, Path result)
123      throws IOException, TransformerException;
124}
